titleStmt.title: Mr. Lillies new prophecy, of the white-Easter, and its effects. With an account of the new blazing-star : being a full account of a strange comet lately seen in the heavens, its shape, place in the zodiack, motion, their time of continuance, and probable portents or matters thereby signified to happen in the world.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: title page stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
